properties.name: process.ancestors.args
properties.definition: Arguments of the process (as a string)

properties.name: process.ancestors.args_flags
properties.definition: Arguments of the process (as an array)

properties.name: process.ancestors.args_options
properties.definition: Arguments of the process (as an array)

properties.name: process.ancestors.argv
properties.definition: Arguments of the process (as an array)

properties.name: process.ancestors.cap_effective
properties.definition: Effective capability set of the process

properties.name: process.ancestors.cap_permitted
properties.definition: Permitted capability set of the process

properties.name: process.ancestors.created_at
properties.definition: Timestamp of the creation of the process

properties.name: process.ancestors.envs
properties.definition: Environment variable names of the process

properties.name: process.ancestors.file.in_upper_layer
properties.definition: Indicator of the file layer, in an OverlayFS for example

properties.name: process.ancestors.file.name
properties.definition: Basename of the path of the process executable

properties.name: process.ancestors.pid
properties.definition: Process ID of the process (also called thread group ID)

properties.name: process.ancestors.tty_name
properties.definition: Name of the TTY associated with the process

properties.definition: Hash (sha1) of the eBPF program (added in 7.35)
